attr.title: Quarion
attr.desc: A short 2D pixel-style metroidvania where you explore, fight bosses, aquire items and abilities and find secrets. Inspired by games such as You Have to Win the Game and VVVVVV.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Itch.io or Steam
Itch.io: Download Quarion for Windows and place Quarion.exe in ports/quarion 
Steam: Download the Windows version of the game and place Quarion.exe in ports/quarion
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [itch.io](https://zejoant.itch.io/quarion) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3870310/Quarion/) 
Itch.io: Download Quarion for Windows and place Quarion.exe in ports/quarion 
Steam: Download the Windows version of the game and place Quarion.exe in ports/quarion
